meanings.sent1: The antsier puppy couldn't sit still during the training session.
meanings.sent2: She became antsier as the time passed without any news.
meanings.sent3: The antsier squirrel kept darting back and forth across the yard, looking for its hidden acorns.
meanings.sent4: As the storm approached, the antsier clouds gathered in the sky, ready to burst.
meanings.sent5: The antsier children bounced around the playground, eager for the bell to ring.

meanings.definition: Feeling or showing anxiety or nervousness.
meanings.sent1: He grew antsier as the deadline for the project drew near.
meanings.sent2: The antsier cat paced back and forth in front of the closed door.
meanings.sent3: The antsier student chewed on the end of their pencil during the exam.
meanings.sent4: Her heart beat faster, like an antsier drum, as she waited for the interview to start.
meanings.sent5: The antsier expression on his face gave away his unease about the upcoming presentation.
